title: Bitcoinking99
author: Bitcoinking99
created_time: August 16, 2022, 07:25:46 PMLast edit: August 26, 2022, 05:04:29 AM by Bitcoinking99
content: BOUNTY ENDED _________________________________________________________   Tha bounty campaign will be managed by   Bitcoinking 2.All participants must join Lithosphere  Telegram group, Discord and Twitter page 2. All participants must join Bounty telegram group3. Refrain from promoting talking about bounty programs in project chat groups.An immediate ban from company chat groups. Please ask your bounty-related questions in our bounty group.4. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior may result in your being rejected.5. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming will get you disqualified from the bounty program and all your accounts will be permanently banned.6. Red Trust accounts will not be accepted in any way.7. All participants must submit their weekly reports to this bounty thread. For every week, you need to create new report. Anyone submitting the same work twice will be rejected.8. The reward distribution of Lithosphere Token bounty is  by project team.                             Week 1 (17.08 - 23.08)                             Week 2 (24.08 -30.08)                             Week 3 (31.08 - 06.09)                             Week 4 (07.09 - 13.09)Rules:  1.  must follow Lithosphere  Twitter Page : https://twitter.com/SuperLitho2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.3. Participants have to make new 2 tweet And 5 Retweet  per week 4. Participants must use #lithosphere #Cryptocurrency #BSC #defi #Binance #Bitcoin 1.  501+ followers: 1 stake2.  1501+ followers: 2 stake3.  5001+ followers: 3 stakes4.  10,001 followers: 4 stakesRewards:5 stakes/week1. Update your Telegram name to Your Name | Lithosphere  (Example: Bitcoinking | Lithosphere )2. Replace your profile picture with Lithosphere  Logo.Rules:1. Must join Lithosphere  Telegram group2. Write posts in the Crypto-currency  group (only quality posts accepted)3. If you write any spam message you will be banned immediately4. Max posts per week: 55. You can ask questions about our Bounty in official group, but do not Spam!Rewards:5 stakes/week• Maximum 5 posts per week.Rules:• Write your posts in crypto currency group.• Only positive posts will be rewarded. Posts like Hi, Hello, Good project, will not be counted.• Do not SPAM, if you have any questions ask in the bounty group.• We count only 1 post per day, submit report weekly to receive stakes.
